channel.title: Data-captures on MIP specifications
channel.description: Recent content in Data-captures on MIP specifications

item.title: Data Capture
item.description:
Goals

The main role of the Data Capture is to take data coming several clinical systems in a hospital, collect that data and remove any identifying information from them, then export that data as a collection of CSV files and DICOM/Nifti files to be processed by the Data Factory.

  disparate clinical data => collection + de-identification => export to exchange directory

item.title: output
item.description:
The Data Capture should export its data into a folder made available to the Data Factory


  ├── DICOM
  │   └── 20161029
  │       └── scan_research_id
  │           └── dicom_name_generated_01.dcm
  │           └── dicom_name_generated_02.dcm
  │           └── dicom_name_generated_03.dcm
  └── EHR
      └── 20161029
          ├── table1.csv
          └── table2.csv

After de-identification, we should ensure that patient IDs present in the EHR data match patient IDs present in the DICOM headers.
